howto\/migrationos.smart.md.La migration de l'environnement Debian e: The migration of the Debian environment and the Smart kernel is a long and complex process, several essential prerequisites must therefore be taken into account before starting the operation
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.que la box Smart et y accéder à partir d: than the Smart box and access it from its
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Comme à l'habitude, il est vivement reco: As usual, it is strongly recommended to keep a
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Vous avez la possibilité d'initier la pr: You have the possibility to initiate the migration procedure in 2 ways
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.La première étape de la migration consis: The first step in the migration is to prepare and verify the hardware
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Les prérequis mentionnés précédemment so: The previously mentioned prerequisites are recalled in a pop-up window and you are prompted to insert a USB key
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.disposant de plus de 8Go d'espace libre: with more than 8GB of free space in the Smart box
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Une fois la clé USB insérée, vous pouvez: Once the USB stick is inserted, you can click on the arrow to start the process
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Lorsque les prérequis sont validés, nous: When the prerequisites are validated, we can go to step 2
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Il n'est pas nécessaire de rester devant: You don't have to stay in front of the screen during the whole process
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Celui-ci va se dérouler automatiquement: This will take place automatically until you offer to restore a backup
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.La seconde étape va se charger de génére: The second step will take care of generating a backup of your Jeedom, a copy of which will be kept on the USB key
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Cette sauvegarde sera restaurée à la fin: This backup will be restored at the end of the migration process if you wish
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.En cas de besoin, la sauvegarde se trouv: If necessary, the backup is located in a directory named
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Nous vous recommandons tout de même de v: We still recommend that you make sure you have a recent Jeedom backup available elsewhere
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.La durée de la phase de sauvegarde sera: The duration of the backup phase will depend on the size of your installation and the remote backup options implemented
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Vous avez la possibilité d'accélérer le: You have the option to speed up the process by disabling the sending of Market and / or Samba backups beforehand
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.La troisième étape va permettre de téléc: The third step will allow you to download the image containing the new version of the Debian environment and check its validity after downloading
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Cette étape peut durer un certain temps: This step may take a while and will depend on the speed of your internet connection as well as the read / write performance of the USB key
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.De loin l'étape la plus importante car i: By far the most important step because it is the actual migration of the hardware
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Il ne faut surtout pas débrancher la clé: Above all, do not disconnect the USB key or cut off the power supply to the Smart during this phase
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Cette étape dure une trentaine de minute: This step lasts about thirty minutes after which the Smart box will restart
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Ce premier redémarrage est susceptible d: This first reboot is likely to take some time
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.A l'issue du processus de migration, la: At the end of the migration process, the Smart box is now in an up-to-date environment but with a virgin Jeedom
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.La finalisation de la procédure va donc: The finalization of the procedure will therefore consist either of starting from a clean installation or of restoring the backup generated during the first step
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Veillez à bien retirer la clé USB de la: Make sure to remove the USB key from the Smart box at the end of the operation
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.votre box Smart est maintenant à jour et: your Smart box is now up to date and operational
howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Le processus de migration se déroule cor: The migration process takes place correctly, however no change seems to have taken place after restarting the box

howto\/migrationos.smart.md.Vérifiez la présence et l'adresse ip de: Check the presence and the ip address of the Jeedom box from the interface of your router in case it has changed its ip address

howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Mettre en place le DNS Jeedom pour avoir: Set up Jeedom DNS to have access to your Jeedom externally via a HTTPS URL
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Le DNS Jeedom agit comme un reverse prox: The Jeedom DNS acts as a reverse proxy so it only gives access to your Jeedom in https, it will therefore not be possible to access your Jeedom in SSH remotely with the Jeedom DNS
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Pour avoir accès aux DNS Jeedom il faut: To have access to Jeedom DNS it is absolutely necessary to have a service pack power or more
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Le principe du DNS Jeedom est très simpl: The principle of Jeedom DNS is very simple, your Jeedom will connect to one of our VPN servers (encrypted connection
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Ensuite ce serveur en question chez nous: Then this server in question with us makes "reverse proxy" during the request
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.il prend votre demande de connexion à vo: it takes your request to connect to your jeedom and transfers it to it
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Ce principe a l'avantage de ne pas expos: This principle has the advantage of not exposing your Jeedom on the internet, no port opening to do
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Pour que cela fonctionne il faut que vot: For this to work, your box must authorize an outgoing connection on ports 1194,1195,1196,1197,1198,1199,2000 and 2001 in UDP
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.En particulier pour les Livebox et route: In particular for Liveboxes and Huawei 4G routers you have to lower the level of the firewall, for people at free you also sometimes have to switch to a fixed IP (otherwise free shares your IP between several users which poses problems for the DNS) moreover for Freebox Delta you need to deactivate parental controls
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Là c'est super simple, vous devez connec: There it is super simple, you must connect your Jeedom to the market (see documentation first-step
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Puis sur votre Jeedom, dans l'administra: Then on your Jeedom, in its administration go to the Networks tab and check "Use Jeedom DNS" then save
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Jeedom va démarrer le DNS et vous donner: Jeedom will start the DNS and give you your access url to your Jeedom
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Vous pouvez changer cette url en allant: You can change this url by going to your market profile page then my services tab and clicking on configuration in "Easy remote access", in the DNS field you can personalize it
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Après enregistrement il faut dans Jeedom: After registration, you must restart the DNS in Jeedom (Settings -> System -> Configuration then Networks tab and restart in the "DNS (proxy) Market" section
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Il est conseillé de faire cette manipula: It is advisable to do this manipulation with local access to your box
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Voilà votre Jeedom est accessible de l'e: Here your Jeedom is accessible from the outside in https
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Y a-t-il besoin d'ouvrir des ports sur m: Is there a need to open ports on my box
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Non il n'y a pas besoin d'ouvrir de port: No, there is no need to open a port on your internet box to your Jeedom
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.La connexion est dans le sens Jeedom ->: The connection is in the Jeedom -> VPN direction, so it is an outgoing connection (on ports 1194,1195,1996,1997,1198,1199,2000 and 2001) and not an incoming connection
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Pourquoi le DNS Jeedom protège mon accès: Why Jeedom DNS protects my access to it
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Les DNS Jeedom permettent de mettre en p: Jeedom DNS allows you to set up something very important, HTTPS access, this guarantees that the connection between your browser and your Jeedom is encrypted, moreover the certificate being valid nobody will be able to impersonate your Jeedom
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Enfin la connexion VPN entre votre Jeedo: Finally, the VPN connection between your Jeedom and our servers is also encrypted
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.J'ai changé le port d'écoute interne de: I changed the internal listening port of my Jeedom and the Jeedom DNS no longer work
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Effectivement le DNS Jeedom ne fonctionn: Indeed the Jeedom DNS only works if your Jeedom listens on local port 80 (all the other ports are closed on the VPN interface when connecting
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Cela ne pose pas de soucis de sécurité c: This does not pose security concerns because the VPN creates an encrypted tunnel, so even if the flow is in clear on port 80 it is encrypted in the VPN tunnel
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Je n'ai pas la page de connexion mais im: I don't have the login page but can't login
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Vérifiez que vous avez bien changé les i: Check that you have changed the default jeedom credentials (admin / admin) and that your user is not restricted locally only
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Ma configuration est bonne mais impossib: My configuration is good but impossible to have a page it turns endlessly
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Cannot open TUN\/TAP dev \/dev\/net\/tun: Cannot open TUN / TAP dev / dev / net / tun
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Cette erreur se produit en général sur l: This error usually occurs on docker type installations, as indicated in the documentation for
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.le support de docker est beta justement: docker support is beta precisely because of this kind of problem
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.La solution est en général l'installatio: The solution is usually to install openvpn on the host (when possible)

howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Le monitoring cloud est un service Jeedo: Cloud monitoring is a paid Jeedom SAS service which permanently monitors your Jeedoms or your Jeedoms and warns you in case of problems
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.En fonction du nombre de mois pris vous: Depending on the number of months taken, you will have the right to free months
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Jeedom envoi regulierement les informati: Jeedom regularly sends the information on the health page to our monitoring service, which analyzes it and alerts you if you have any concerns
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.De plus si votre box n'envoi pas d'infor: De plus si votre box n'envoi pas d'information pendant plus de 60min notre service monitoring vous prévient qu'il y a un soucis
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Par default vous êtes prévenu par un mai: By default you are notified by an email on your email configured in your profiles but you can in the cloud monitoring configuration (on your market profiles page
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Mettre une autre adresse mail (une seule: Put another email address (only one possible
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Ajouter une alerte sur Slack (il faut ju: Add an alert on Slack (just give the address of Webhook
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Ajouter une alerte par SMS (attention ce: Add an SMS alert (note that this requires that you have SMS credit on the market
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Ajouter une alerte par Notification (néc: Add an alert by Notification (requires the mobile app
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Vous pouvez trouver votre chatid a parti: You can find your chatid from jeedom by going to the telegram equipment then advanced configuration of the desired recipient's command then the information button and in the configuration field you have the chatid
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Attention on voit beaucoup d'utilisateur: Attention we see a lot of users with "mailinblack" mailboxes, who during the 1st exchange ask the sender to validate a link to prove that it is indeed a human
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Ce systeme n'est pas compatible avec le: This system is not compatible with the mailing system of the monitoring service
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Merci donc sur votre page profils du mar: So thank you on your market profiles page to put an email address not using this system otherwise you will never receive an alert from the system
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.La procedure est assez simple, il faut: The procedure is quite simple, you have to
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.avoir du crédit monitoring cloud (il s'a: have credit monitoring cloud (you can buy it in a batch of 1 month, so you can take 2 months then stop 6 months and then resume after
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Après avoir ajouté du crédit monitoring: After adding cloud monitoring credit, you must either wait a few hours (around 24 hours), or in Jeedom, on the configuration section then update click on the "test" button for connection to the market (this forces Jeedom to recover market information and therefore the fact that the cloud monitoring service is active
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Une fois le service activé celui-ci surv: Once the service is activated, it monitors all Jeedom connected to your account
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Il est cependant possible a partir de Je: It is however possible from Jeedom 4
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.2 de désactiver la monitoring depuis la: 2 to deactivate monitoring from its configuration (Market / update tab)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Pour les notifications il suffit de récu: For notifications, just collect the arn from your mobile, it is located in the mobile plugin, on your mobile equipment, then access the "notification" tab, then copy the "ARN" line. that there is after "arn

howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Vous trouverez ici la documentation pour: You will find here the documentation to install Jeedom on a raspberry PI 3
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Le PI3 offre en effet la possibilité de: The PI3 indeed offers the possibility of booting directly onto a USB device and therefore freeing yourself from the microSD card that sometimes generates problems (corruption
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.La procédure d'installation est strictem: The installation procedure is strictly identical to that on a microSD card, but you will need to make sure you have up-to-date firmware
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Pour cela ouvrez une connexion SSH: To do this, open an SSH connection
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.si vous ne savez pas comment faire, rega: if you don't know how, watch the installation on microSD
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Si c'est le cas, votre PI3 est correctem: If so, your PI3 is properly configured to boot from USB
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Si il ne trouve rien, il démarrera norma: If it finds nothing, it will boot normally on a microSD card
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Si le retour est différent, vous devez s: If the return is different, you just need to update
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Pour éviter les problèmes de puissance,: To avoid power issues, choose a low-consumption mSATA SSD
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Vous pouvez désormais installer Jeedom e: You can now install Jeedom by following exactly the same procedure as with an SD card
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Il faut ensuite prendre en compte les re: The following remarks must then be taken into account
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Les modifications suivantes sont le frui: The following changes are the result of problems encountered by users
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Vous devez les adapter à votre cas: You must adapt them to your case
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Le support Jeedom n'intervient pas pour: Jeedom support does not intervene for problems related to your configuration
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Si vous rencontrez des problèmes de swap: If you encounter swap problems, you should modify it
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Changez la taille de la swap en ouvrant: Change the size of the swap by opening this file
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Par défaut, le système appelle le swap l: By default, the system calls the swap when there is less than 40% of Ram
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Ouvrez le fichier pour changer ce paramè: Open the file to change this setting
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Ajoutez cette ligne, pour demander au Pi: Add this line, to ask Pi3 to use the swap only when it has 10% of available memory (100 MB of available RAM
howto\/raspberrypi3.md.Désactiver le bluetooth intégré car inco: Disable built-in bluetooth because incompatible with the GPIO card zwave.me

howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Il existe dans Jeedom plusieurs manières: There are several ways in Jeedom to report a concern
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Remonter le souci sur la: Put the concern back on the
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.c'est en général la que vous aurez la ré: this is usually where you will get the quickest response
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Remonter un souci à l'équipe Jeedom: Report a concern to the Jeedom team
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.nécessite un service pack power ou plus: requires a service pack power or more or even if the concern is on a plugin / paid service), this request is
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.et vous mettra directement en relation a: and will put you directly in contact with the Jeedom support team which analyzes your particular case
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.dans ce cas la demande est: in this case the request is
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.et sera postée sur la communauté: and will be posted on the community
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Dans le cas d'une demande de support sur: In the case of a support request on a third-party plugin, an email is sent to the plugin developer
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Le support étant réalisé exclusivement p: The support being carried out exclusively by email, remember to monitor your spam
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Le plus souvent, le support répond rapid: Most often, the support responds quickly (delay before response on average of less than 72 hours, be careful depending on the problem it can be much longer
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Quelles informations envoyer pour avoir: What information to send to have a solution as quickly as possible
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Quelque soit la méthode utilisée pour re: Whatever method is used to report the problem encountered, it is very important to give as much information as possible
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.En effet, à notre plus grand regret, 80%: Indeed, to our greatest regret, 80% of requests have the first standard response
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.merci de nous donner davantage d'informa: please give us more information about the problem so that we can help you. [
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Et oui...malgré notre bonne volonté, on: And yes ... despite our good will, we do not see your screen, we have no history of what you did as manipulation, and we sometimes use a different vocabulary to talk about the same things
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Mais comme on a vraiment envie de vous a: But as we really want to help you, here are some clues to give us some valuable information
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Votre souci concerne un problème d'affic: Your concern concerns a graphical display problem (widget, page, text fields ...), even if it seems obvious to you during the explanation, put a screenshot (indeed, it is possible to copy the image directly on the community!), it takes 30s for you, it will save several tens of minutes for the person trying to help you, and you will get a relevant answer, faster
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Vous avez une erreur \"500\" ou des \"\\: You have a "500" error or "\ {\ {" on Jeedom
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.dans ce cas, mettez directement le fichi: in this case, directly put the http file
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.error (vous pouvez le trouver rapidement: error (you can find it quickly in Analysis -> Logs), without that, we cannot know where the problem comes from (again, no warning light at jeedom or among third-party developers for the moment
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Vous avez une erreur javascript (panneau: You have a javascript error (warning panel at the top right) or when you do F12 then console a red line
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Dans ce cas, commencer par nous donner l: In this case, start by giving us the full error message in question
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Malheureusement, dans la majorité des ca: Unfortunately, in the majority of cases this error message being sometimes a little vague, does not by itself allow to identify the problem encountered
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Il faut donc faire F12 (dans le navigate: So you have to do F12 (in the browser, on the Jeedom tab where you are having trouble
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Cliquer ensuite sur \"console\", puis es: Then click on "console", then try to reproduce the problem encountered (start by refreshing the page, and if necessary, repeat the same actions
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Vous allez normalement avoir à nouveau l: You will normally get the error message again but this time you will have to click at the end of the line (it can be either as in the screenshot below or in the form VM
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Puis faire une capture de ce qui va s'af: Then take a screenshot of what will be displayed, in particular the red line
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Voila si vous suivez bien tout ça vous d: Here if you follow all this well you should have answers to your problem much faster and much more accurate and maybe even allow the person who helped you to help another person faster
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Vous avez un souci avec un démon: You have a problem with a demon
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.il faut absolument mettre la log en debu: it is absolutely necessary to put the log in debug of it otherwise no help will be possible
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Vous pouvez aussi ajouter la log d'insta: You can also add the dependencies installation log (often in\_update
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Vous avez un problème d'installation de: You have a problem installing dependencies
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.il faut absolument mettre la log de leur: it is absolutely necessary to put the log of their installation (often in\_update
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Si vous n'avez pas trouvé de solution à: If you have not found a solution to your problem, you can request support from the Jeedom team
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Cette demande passe par un ticket: This request goes through a ticket
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Le support est accessible en fonction de: Support is available depending on your Service Pack
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Service Pack Community (version gratuite: Service Pack Community (free version of Jeedom
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.2 tickets\/mois sur les plugins payants: 2 tickets / month on paid plugins only
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Il est possible d'ouvrir une demande de: It is possible to open a request in several ways
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Attention on voit beaucoup d'utilisateur: Attention we see a lot of users with "mailinblack" mailboxes, who during the 1st exchange ask the sender to validate a link to prove that it is indeed a human
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Ce systeme n'est pas compatible avec not: This system is not compatible with our ticketing system, so even if we answer you, you will never receive the answer in your mailbox because it blocks us
howto\/remonter_un_bug.md.Merci donc sur votre page profils du mar: So thank you on your market profiles page to put an email address not using this system otherwise you will never receive our response

howto\/sauvegarde.comment_faire.md.Il y a deux manières de sauvegarder Jeed: There are two ways to save Jeedom and each has advantages and disadvantages

howto\/sauvegarde.comment_faire.md.Elle a l'avantage de pouvoir être faite: It has the advantage of being able to be made hot and the backup file can be exported to other media
howto\/sauvegarde.comment_faire.md.Il est aussi possible de réaliser une sa: It is also possible to make a backup by making a disk image of the microSD card (mini and mini +
